author: Reuters
title: Coronavirus death toll in U.S. now more than 1,000
description: The U.S. coronavirus death toll topped the 1,000 milestone, as the pandemic's mounting economic burden was illustrated by government data on Thursday showing a record number of Americans seeking unemployment benefits and hospitals struggled to treat a surge o…
